statements: SELECT * FROM LiteratureAnalysis;
SELECT title, authors FROM LiteratureAnalysis;
SELECT authors, title, publication_date FROM LiteratureAnalysis;
SELECT title, keywords FROM LiteratureAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM LiteratureAnalysis ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LiteratureAnalysis WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, authors FROM LiteratureAnalysis WHERE authors LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM LiteratureAnalysis WHERE keywords LIKE '%science%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM LiteratureAnalysis ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT authors FROM LiteratureAnalysis WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM literature_articles
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_articles WHERE author='John Doe'
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT article_id, title, author, publication_date FROM literature_articles JOIN citation_records ON literature_articles.article_id = citation_records.citing_article_id
SELECT * FROM literature_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author FROM literature_articles WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM literature_articles WHERE publication_date = '2021-06-15';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM literature_articles WHERE title LIKE '%Introduction%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM citation_records WHERE citation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM research_papers;
SELECT id, title FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, authors[1] AS main_author FROM research_papers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, COUNT(citation_id) AS total_citations FROM research_papers LEFT JOIN citations ON research_papers.id = citations.paper_id GROUP BY title;
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, authors[1] AS first_author FROM research_papers WHERE id IN (SELECT paper_id FROM citations WHERE cited_paper_id = 1);
SELECT topic_id, topic_name FROM research_topics ORDER BY topic_name;
SELECT rp.title, COUNT(c.paper_id) AS citation_count FROM research_papers rp LEFT JOIN citations c ON rp.id = c.cited_paper_id GROUP BY rp.title ORDER BY citation_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication FROM research_papers;
SELECT paper_title, paper_author FROM research_papers;
SELECT paper_title, paper_abstract, publish_date FROM research_papers;
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT author_name, author_affiliation FROM authors ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT paper_id, paper_title, paper_author FROM research_papers WHERE paper_author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM research_papers ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT paper_title, paper_author FROM research_papers WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT paper_title, COUNT(citation_id) AS citation_count FROM research_papers LEFT JOIN citations ON research_papers.paper_id = citations.paper_id GROUP BY paper_title;
SELECT paper_title, author_name, author_affiliation FROM research_papers JOIN authors ON research_papers.paper_author = authors.author_name;
SELECT paper_title, keyword_name FROM research_papers JOIN keywords ON paper_title LIKE '%' || keyword_name || '%';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_sources;
SELECT * FROM research_topics WHERE topic_name = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT source_id, title, author, publication_date FROM literature_sources ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, summary FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM article_authors WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT * FROM literature_sources WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT title, author FROM literature_sources WHERE source_type = 'Book' ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT title, publication_date FROM research_articles WHERE topic_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM article_authors ORDER BY author_name DESC
SELECT literature_sources.title, research_articles.title FROM literature_sources INNER JOIN research_articles ON literature_sources.source_id = research_articles.article_id
